select.all: SELECT U.id, U.kid, user_name AS user_name, U.server, U.userkey, U.db_password, U.fenics_key, (SELECT COUNT(kid) FROM clients WHERE kid = U.kid AND is_admin = 0) AS client_number, U.has_mobile, ENV.system_type, ENV.version, name as creater, (SELECT MAX(DATE_FORMAT(create_on, '%Y-%m-%d')) FROM clients WHERE kid = U.kid) AS update_on FROM kids AS U LEFT JOIN login_users AS L ON U.create_user_id = L.id  LEFT JOIN customers AS cus ON U.kid = cus.kid LEFT JOIN environments AS ENV ON U.environment_id = ENV.id
select.servers: SELECT SV.id, SV.ip, SV.name, SV.type, ENV.version FROM servers AS SV INNER JOIN environments AS ENV ON SV.environment_id = ENV.id order by name, ip, version
select.clients: SELECT kid, client_id, client_pass, create_user_id, DATE_FORMAT( create_on, '%Y-%m-%d') as create_on, is_admin FROM clients where kid = ? order by client_id;
select.users: SELECT * FROM login_users where uid = ? and password = ?;
select.usrHistorys: SELECT H.type, H.content_name, H.item_name, H.before, H.after, DATE_FORMAT( create_on, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_on, L.name as creater FROM HISTORYS H LEFT JOIN login_users L ON H.create_user_id = L.id WHERE ? order by create_on desc;
select.historys: SELECT H.id, H.kid, H.type, H.content_name, H.item_name, H.`before`, H.`after`, DATE_FORMAT( H.create_on, '%Y/%m/%d') as create_on, L.name FROM historys H left join login_users L on H.create_user_id = L.id order by id desc limit 10;
select.moreHistorys: SELECT H.id, H.kid, H.type, H.content_name, H.item_name, H.`before`, H.`after`, DATE_FORMAT( H.create_on, '%Y/%m/%d') as create_on, L.name FROM historys H left join login_users L on H.create_user_id = L.id where H.id < ? order by id desc limit 11;
select.userkey: SELECT userkey FROM kids WHERE userkey = ?;
select.kid: SELECT kid FROM kids WHERE environment_id = ? order by kid desc;
select.db_password: SELECT db_password from kids WHERE db_password = ?;
select.findEnvironmentId: select id from environments where system_type = ? and version = ?;

update.date: UPDATE USERS SET updateDate = ? WHERE kid = ?
update.client_number: UPDATE USERS SET client_number = ? WHERE kid = ?
update.columns: UPDATE columns SET kid = ?, company = ?, server = ?, userKey = ?, genics = ?, name = ?, client_number = ?, update_on = ? WHERE uid = ?;
